title: Soarian Technologies
content: • We are adigital transformation company that puts the most pressing customer challenges at the heart of our brand. Technology is our passion and we are obsessed with helping our customers in their digital transformation journey. We are a fast-growing start-up on a mission to create products & solutions for operating digital companies & enabling digital transformation. Our technology focus areas are Mobile, serverless cloud, block chain & Artificial Intelligence. Our domain focus is fin tech, healthcare, retail & travel tech.
